result.execSummary:
The defendant Scott B. Faulkner was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: TIME IS SERVED.  Costs rolled in.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Scott B. Faulkner

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt:
Minutes:  11CF618/14CF1444.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Kraus appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Ted Kmiec.  Cases are resolved.  

11CF618 - deft pleads guilty to counts 1 & 2; found guilty by the Court.  Remaining counts are dismissed on State's motion.  Parties waive PSI.  Sentencing arguments made.  Ct 1 - deft sentenced to 60 days KCJ.  Credit for 60 days served.  Costs rolled into sentence.  Ct 2 - deft fined $600 plus costs.  30 DTP.  In default, 37 days work crew or 37 days KCJ consec.  

14CF1444 - deft pleads guilty; found guilty by the Court.  Parties waive PSI.  Sentencing arguments made.  Deft sentenced to 6 days KCJ.  Credit for 6 days already served.  Costs rolled into sentence.  

Appeal rights.  Firearm warning.  Voting acknowledgment
Defense counsel reports the case is settled; due to ongoing jury trial, plea hrg set for 6/4/15 @ 1:15pm.  Attys notified

Attorney Jessica Krejcarek appeared for the State. Def. appeared (in custody) with Atty. Ted Kmiec. Clerk LE.  Prelim. waived, probable cause found. Bound over to Br. 3. Information filed, plea of not guilty. Judicial pretrial on 6-3-15 @ 10:10am. Jury selection on 7-13-15 @ 9:00am. Bond continued.

1:03  Attorney Michael Graveley appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney T Kmiec. Clerk LE.  Warrant vacated.   Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; set before Commissioner on  4-17-15 @ 10:00 am.   $750.00 Continued Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).

1:17  Atty Jerrold Hinshaw appeared as Special Prosecutor for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney A Komp. Clerk LE. Initial appearance adjourned to 4-10-15 @ 1:00 pm  Warrant vacated.  $750.00 Temporary Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).
Warrant served, def. in custody.  Return on warrant today at 1:00 before Intake Commissioner.
and witness list filed by the State
